Ripper's Notes:
Hmmmmmmmmmm! Phew! Finally DONE 
To Begin With Eng Video, It Was very good Not At all Looking Like cam...Stretched it a bit and made few gamma,contrast and brightness effect change...
Audio was vey clear from source..not touched it much..just made few filters where-ever reqired...

Before posting gave to few friends to chk sample..
They gave :
Video: 7.5/10
Audio: 7/10


Most Important part that i forgot to mention..that i have used more than 5hrs to make this rip...if u cant appreciate it atleast dont discourage me,,oh hell don't even bother to comment 
ENJOY!

WOW!!! I can't BELIEVE there's no comments on quality, and that my "minus 1" is the only quality rating so far.

A/3
V/2 !
My phone takes WAAAY better videos, and I bought it used for thirty friggin' dollars!

I usually NEVER D/L TS's, R5's and CAM's, but I figures "oooh, 720p... Hi-Def, maybe it's like my little samsung HD camcorder". No... No no no.

I actually recommend u download this- JUST to witness the ATROCITY that this uploader is trying to pass-off as High-Res.
Seriously, it's a good laugh (I watched about 120 seconds of it before stopping it).
